Metrics¶

class src.metrics.accuracy.Accuracy(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: src.metrics.base.BaseMetric, pytorch_lightning.metrics.classification.Accuracy

Computes the accuracy classification score

Example

>>> pred = torch.tensor([0, 1, 2, 3])
>>> target = torch.tensor([0, 1, 2, 2])
>>> metric = Accuracy()
>>> metric(pred, target)
tensor(0.7500)
